author: Reuters
title: França, Alemanha, Reino Unido e EUA condenam aumento do enriquecimento de urânio no Irã
text: França, Alemanha, Reino Unido e EUA condenam aumento do enriquecimento de urânio no Irã França, Alemanha, Reino Unido e Estados Unidos condenaram nesta quinta-feira o Irã por conta de um aumento na taxa de produção de urânio altamente enriquecido com até 60% de pureza, próximo ao nível usado para combustível de armas nucleares. Em um comunicado conjunto, os aliados não fizeram menção a qualquer consequência que o Irã poderá enfrentar pelo aumento da produção, mas apelaram à sua reversão e disseram que continuam "comprometidos com uma solução diplomática" para a disputa em relação ao programa nuclear de Teerã. "A produção de urânio altamente enriquecido pelo Irã não tem qualquer justificação civil crível", afirmou o comunicado. "Estas decisões... representam um comportamento imprudente em um contexto regional tenso." Desde o início da ofensiva de Israel contra os militantes do Hamas, que estão no poder em Gaza, aliados do Irã aumentaram os seus ataques aos navios no Mar Vermelho e às tropas dos EUA no Iraque e na Síria, aumentando drasticamente as tensões na região. Israel lançou a sua operação em resposta ao ataque do Hamas em Israel, em 7 de Outubro. O órgão de vigilância nuclear da ONU, a Agência Internacional de Energia Atômica (AIEA), disse em um relatório na terça-feira que o Irã reverteu uma desaceleração de meses na taxa de produção de urânio altamente enriquecido com pureza de até 60%. "Condenamos esta ação, que contribui para a escalada inabalável do programa nuclear do Irã", afirmou o comunicado conjunto.

author: NY Weekly Staff
title: A Tale of Dedication and Compassion: Meet Theresa Pinson, Founder of Virtual Skin Spa
text:
Theresa Pinson’s journey exemplifies the significance of passion and perseverance. Originating from the rural community of Newton, Alabama, she learned the value of hard work from an early age. Tasks such as babysitting and pumping gas at just 11 years old instilled in Pinson the importance of self-reliance and seizing opportunities. Her formative years taught her that success demands resourcefulness.
Little did Pinson know that her humble beginnings would pave the way for her to establish a thriving medical spa in Jericho, Long Island, and the bustling metropolis of Manhattan.
Her childhood experiences deeply influenced her inclination to care for others. She recalls feeling a sense of solitude during her formative years, which cultivated a profound empathy within her and sparked a desire to offer solace to those in need.
This inherent calling drove Pinson to pursue a career in nursing, with a specialization in open-heart and cardiovascular care. Observing the consequences of unhealthy lifestyle choices, she was motivated to empower individuals to lead healthier lives by promoting wellness and well-being.
During her graduate studies, where she earned a Master of Science in Nursing as a family Nurse Practitioner, Pinson discovered the transformative effects of cosmetic treatments like Botox. Recognizing the potential to enhance individuals’ self-esteem, she embarked on a journey to master these procedures.
Despite the scarcity of opportunities for nurse practitioners in the field at the time, Pinson’s unwavering determination led her to a position at a renowned clinic on 5th Avenue, Manhattan. With no prior experience, she seized the opportunity, immersing herself in an intensive six-week training program. Under the guidance of seasoned professionals, she honed her skincare and cosmetic procedures skills.
Reflecting on her time at the clinic, Pinson acknowledges the invaluable experience it provided, which instilled in her a sense of confidence and proficiency. She recalls it as a rigorous yet rewarding experience where she learned to prioritize patient care while delivering exceptional results.
Her career trajectory led her to various roles, including a stint with Alabama’s government Wellness Program and collaborating with a plastic surgeon. However, her unwavering passion for skincare and rejuvenation ultimately culminated in establishing her venture,
Virtual Skin Spa, on Long Island.
As the owner and operator, Pinson takes pride in offering top-notch services, ranging from
Emsculpt Neo to facial rejuvenation. However, her approach extends beyond mere aesthetics; she prioritizes accessibility, ensuring her pricing model fosters long-term client relationships. Pinson emphasizes a culture of positivity and inclusivity, asserting that aging should be embraced, not feared.
Pinson’s commitment to her clients’ well-being and her unique blend of compassion and expertise have not gone unnoticed. Her practice’s mission resonates with individuals seeking a sanctuary where they can not only enhance their appearance but also rediscover their confidence.
Beyond her role at Virtual Skin Spa, Pinson mentors aspiring medical professionals, imparting her wisdom and nurturing their passion for helping others.
Theresa Pinson’s journey epitomizes the transformative power of dedication and compassion. From her humble beginnings to her current role as a beacon of positivity and empowerment, she continues to make a profound impact on the lives of those she encounters.
Published by: Nelly Chavez

author: El Universal
title: Barranquilla propone solución definitiva al problema de agua de Santa Marta | El Universal.com
text: Durante una mesa de trabajo con participación de la Superintendencia de Servicios Públicos, las alcaldías de Barranquilla y Santa Marta, y la empresa Triple A, se examinó una propuesta encaminada a plantear la solución definitiva a la crisis de acueducto que atraviesan los samarios hace más de 30 años. [ Lea aquí: Querían matar a alias ‘27′ y como no los dejaron pasar hirieron a una mujer](https://www.eluniversal.com.co/sucesos/2024/07/18/querian-matar-a-alias-27-y-como-no-los-dejaron-pasar-hirieron-a-una-mujer/) La alternativa planteada por el Distrito de Barranquilla contempla la alimentación directa desde el río Magdalena, integrada a obras de planta, redes matrices y tanques proyectados para construir dentro de la ciudad de Santa Marta, y de esta manera distribuir el agua potable a los diferentes barrios. En su cuenta de X, el alcalde Alejandro Char publicó que: “en una productiva mesa de trabajo, compartimos propuestas con Dagoberto Quiroga, superintendente de Servicios Públicos, y Carlos Pinedo, alcalde de Santa Marta, para presentar alternativas que permitan aprovechar el gran potencial hídrico de Barranquilla con el río Magdalena, abasteciendo a esta población y a municipios aledaños”. El mandatario barranquillero destacó la experiencia de la empresa Triple A para llevar a cabo la operación: “es una empresa que ha logrado mucho a lo largo del tiempo y se ha fortalecido, así como también conoce mucho el río Magdalena. Creemos que el río Magdalena es una fuente impresionante de agua, no solo para surtir al Atlántico sino a toda la región”. De acuerdo con un estudio de la empresa Triple A, las principales dificultades del acueducto de Santa Marta radican en la prestación intermitente del servicio de agua potable, especialmente en las zonas más alejadas y en aquellas con elevaciones topográficas altas. Publicidad Es por eso que Ramón Hemer, gerente de Triple A, señaló: “en mi concepto, Santa Marta se ha atrasado por esta falencia, por eso pensamos que lo ideal es un proyecto integral para no quedarnos cortos en el tiempo. Hoy Santa Marta tiene una deficiencia de mil litros por segundo, que es bastante. Por eso pensamos que la solución debe ser desde el río Magdalena, que tiene un gran caudal, que no nos deje cortos”. El gerente de la empresa Triple A, destacó que la solución planteada sería a 50 años y con el crecimiento de la ciudad se convertiría en algo exponencial, que puede impulsar el desarrollo de Santa Marta. Por su parte, el alcalde de Santa Marta, Carlos Pinedo, celebró la iniciativa del Distrito de Barranquilla y aseguró estar dispuesto a estudiar la propuesta que se le está haciendo desde Barranquilla. [Siga leyendo:Novena final para Titanes de Barranquilla en Liga Profesional de Baloncesto](https://www.eluniversal.com.co/deportes/baloncesto/2024/07/18/novena-final-para-titanes-de-barranquilla-en-liga-profesional-de-baloncesto/) “Me complace mucho que nos hayan invitado, estamos abiertos a escuchar todas las posibilidades para mejorar la problemática de agua que tenemos en Santa Marta. Es algo que se ha agudizado, esto es algo de décadas, hemos venido conversando con el Ministerio de Vivienda y con la Superintendencia porque la situación de Santa Marta está sobrediagnosticada”, sostuvo Pinedo. Una vez finalizada la reunión el alcalde Alejandro Char expresó su interés en hacer un acompañamiento a la administración samaria para mejorar la calidad de vida de los habitantes. “Quiero decirles que cuenten con nosotros, estamos dispuestos -si ustedes consideran- a apoyarlos y la Triple A está en condiciones de ser parte de la solución. Estaremos muy gustosos de hacerlo”, terminó diciendo el mandatario de los barranquilleros.

author: Marie Dupin
title: Réchauffement climatique : un bulletin météo de 2050 a été diffusé sur 80 chaînes du monde entier par des enfants inquiets pour leur avenir
text:
Les "weather kids", les "enfants de la météo", Noam, Kaylee ou Esteban, ont présenté jeudi 21 mars 2024, en de nombreuses langues, un bulletin climat qui commençait ainsi : " Du Nord au Sud et du Sud au Nord, côté climat, rien ne va !" Un bandeau laisse croire aux prévisions pour 2050 : "Quand nous serons grands, je vous laisse imaginer, les sécheresses, les canicules, les feux de forêt, ça fait peur hein ?" L'enfant continue avec une donnée effrayante, qui "va nous coûter très cher" : en 2050, le montant du réchauffement climatique est estimé à 600 000 milliards de dollars. Un prix que les enfants devront payer.
Cette opération, organisée par le programme des Nations unies pour le développement (PNUD) en coopération avec l'Organisation météorologique mondiale, a permis la diffusion de cette vidéo sur plus de 80 chaînes de télévision dans le monde, notamment la Rai ou CNN, ainsi que sur de nombreuses plateformes internet.
"Pour nous, il s'agit de notre avenir" Ce n’est pas la première campagne des Nations unies pour le développement sur la crise climatique. En 2021 déjà, le PNUD avait envoyé un dinosaure en images de synthèse, "Frankie le dino", en mission dans la salle de l’Assemblée générale des Nations unies, pour porter ce message : " Au moins, nous, les dinosaures, nous avions un astéroïde, mais vous les humains, c’est quoi votre excuse ? Ne choisissez pas l’extinction, sauvez votre espèce avant qu’il ne soit trop tard ."
At least we had an asteroid. What's your excuse? Follow me to save the world. https://t.co/dxDycGd2D5 #DontChooseExtinction @UNDP pic.twitter.com/qsj9BODifb
— Frankie The Dino (@frankiethedino) October 27, 2021 Depuis Frankie, qui se présente sur les réseaux sociaux comme le "seul survivant de l'astéroïde, troublé par les humains" , n’a cessé de porter son message, sans grand résultat.
S’il est trop tard pour les dinosaures, pour ces enfants, il est encore temps de changer les prévisions qui dépendent uniquement des adultes, de leurs actions ou de leur inaction. Et les enfants de conclure : "Pour vous, il s'agit peut-être seulement d'un flash météo, mais pour nous, il s'agit de notre avenir."

author: Time
title: Hungary's PM Orban supports Trump after Florida meeting
text:
Reuters Hungary's PM Orban supports Trump after Florida meeting Reuters Updated March 9, 2024 at 5:30 PM · 2 min read 1.8k Link Copied Read full article 1 / 2 Hungary's PM Orban supports Trump after Florida meeting FILE PHOTO: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban speaks during an economic forum in Budapest
Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below
BUDAPEST (Reuters) -Hungary's right-wing nationalist Prime Minister Viktor Orban lent his support to long-time ally Donald Trump 's bid to return to White House after meeting the former U.S. president in Florida late on Friday.
The two discussed "a wide range of issues affecting Hungary and the United States, including the paramount importance of strong and secure borders to protect the sovereignty of each nation," according to a statement from Trump's campaign.
Orban has long been at odds with his fellow European Union members over a range of issues, including refusing to send weapons to Kyiv and keeping up economic ties with Moscow since Russian forces invaded Ukraine in 2022.
Orban has said only the return of Republican candidate Trump to the White House could bring peace in Ukraine.
"We need leaders in the world who are respected and can bring peace. He is one of them! Come back and bring us peace, Mr. President!," Orban said in a post on X after the meeting.
Orban, admired by many conservatives in the United States for his tough policies on immigration, his family support schemes and vocal stance on national sovereignty, said in a video on his Facebook page that under Trump's 2017-2021 presidency there was peace in the Middle East and also Ukraine.
"Viktor is a Great Leader, respected all over the World," Trump said on Saturday in a post on his Truth Social messaging platform, saying it had been an honor to host Orban.
"Hungary is a Safe Country because of his Strong Immigration Policies, and as long as he is in charge, it always will be!" Trump added.
Orban has regularly been at loggerheads with the EU over his anti-immigration campaigns and moves to put the judiciary, NGOs, and media under more state control, which critics say have eroded democracy in Hungary.
Orban has also criticised EU sanctions against Russia, although never vetoed them in the end, and held up an EU decision on granting new aide for Ukraine last December until finally agreeing to it early this year.
(Reporting by Krisztina Than in Budapest and David Ljunggren in OttawaEditing by Frances Kerry, Editing by Franklin Paul)
View comments

author: 陳嘉玲
title: 火辣退役女優揭暗黑內幕 拒富豪億元天價飯局驚爆：怕被殺
text:
鏡週刊Mirror Media 火辣退役女優揭暗黑內幕 拒富豪億元天價飯局驚爆：怕被殺 閱讀全文 陳嘉玲 2025年4月30日 下午5:33 濱崎真緒受訪爆料曾收到多次富豪飯局邀約。（翻攝IG@maohamasaki_official）
擁有甜美外貌和火辣身材的前日本AV女優浜崎真緒，過去深受國內外粉絲愛戴。自從宣布引退後，成功轉型為DJ，近期也積極籌備推出寫真集。日前，浜崎真緒在一次訪談中驚爆，多次收到富豪飯局邀約，更令人吃驚的是，對方竟開出一天一億日圓（約新台幣2200萬元）的天價，如此驚人的數字反而讓她當場婉拒。
根據《香港01》報導，日本女星浜崎真緒直率地表示，自己經常收到飯局邀約，次數甚至高達每週四到五次。她更直接公開其中一則從Instagram收到的飯局私訊，提到有件事讓她很不爽，有個好朋友突然跟浜崎真緒說，他認識一個人想花錢跟她一起吃飯。浜崎真緒表示，除了工作和拍攝AV之外，自己從未私下參與過任何這種邀約，坦言這種錢可以靠自己賺，「不用你們付」。
濱崎真緒引退後轉型當DJ。（翻攝IG@maohamasaki_official） 浜崎真緒自爆曾有人出價一天一億日圓（相當於新台幣2200萬元）天價邀約，讓她嚇到認為「很恐怖」，面對如此誘惑，浜崎真緒直接表示並未動心，反而直覺認為鉅款可能招致殺身之禍，「因為這麼多錢放在一起，他可能把我殺了，一億我也花不到」。
濱崎真緒自爆曾有富豪飯局開價一天一億日圓，反而讓她感到驚恐。（翻攝IG@maohamasaki_official） 浜崎真緒聊到在香港進行戶外拍攝寫真的經歷，坦承並不排斥有路人圍觀，但多少還是會感到一點害羞，提到在廟街拍攝時，感覺圍觀的民眾年紀稍長，而且似乎不認識她，只是遠遠拍攝。相較之下，在旺角拍攝時，則有許多人認出她，認為自己粉絲好像都聚集在旺角和蘭桂坊，尤其是在蘭桂坊最多。另外也提到，許多人在在街上和她打招呼後，接著又在Instagram上與她互動。

前傑尼斯偶像下海當牛郎 賣笑討中國富婆歡心！自誇以前很紅
